choices.name: No_More_Species
choices.choiceText: No more species involved in the case

choices.name: noAdditionalCharge
choices.choiceText: No more charges for this defendant

decisions.description: If borough = Brooklyn or Queens, lead attorney is Natasha. If borough = Bronx, Manhattan or Staten Island, lead attorney is Erin
decisions.name: Assign_Lead_Attorney
decisions.label: Assign Lead Attorney

decisions.description: Specifies case type based on previous screen - national criminal, national disaster or NY.
decisions.name: Case_Type
decisions.label: Case Type

decisions.description: Checks if "Initial Animal Status" is equal to either Surrendered or Deceased
decisions.name: Initial_Status_Surrendered_or_Deceased
decisions.label: Initial Status Surrendered or Deceased

decisions.description: If there were no arrests, ask if subjects are known; otherwise add any additional animal owners (if applicable). If defendant was the animal owner, ask if there are additional animal owners. If defendant was not the animal owner, ask if animal owner is known.
decisions.name: Skip_Subject
decisions.label: Skip Subject

rules.name: Yes_arrest_defendant_animal_owner
rules.label: Yes - arrest & defendant was animal owner

rules.name: Yes_arrest_defendant_was_not_animal_owner
rules.label: Yes - arrest & defendant was not animal owner

fields.name: animalOwnerSelectionHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the animal owner for the case.


1. Select the animal owner from the contact list if found and select Yes - add this contact.


2. To conduct another name search, click Previous to go back.


3. Select No - add new contact to create a new contact record.

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_add_this_contact_or_create_a_new_contact_defendant_0_0
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add this contact or create a new contact?

fields.name: Animal_Owner_Notes_Existing
fields.helpText: Include any relevant details about this person and their role

fields.name: addComplainantHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the complainant for the case.


1. Select the complainant from the contact list if found and select Yes - add this contact.


2. To conduct another name search, click Previous to go back.


3. Select No - add new contact to create a new contact record.

fields.fieldText: Do you want to add this contact or create a new contact?

fields.helpText: Include any relevant details about this person and their role

fields.name: officerSelectionHeader_0
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the defendant for the case.


1. Select the defendant from the contact list if found and select Yes - add this contact.


2. To conduct another name search, click Previous to go back.


3. Select No - add new contact to create a new contact record.

fields.name: addRequestingAgencyHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the requesting agency for the case.


1. Select the agency from the list if found and select Yes - add this agency.


2. To conduct another name search, click Previous to go back.


3. Select No - add new agency to create a new agency record.

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_add_this_agency_or_create_a_new_agency
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add this agency or create a new agency?

fields.name: addRequestingAgencyContactHeader
fields.fieldText:
Please provide details of the requesting agency contact for the case.


1. Select the reporting agency contact from the contact list if found and select Yes - add this contact.


2. To conduct another name search, click Previous to go back.


3. Select No - add new contact to create a new contact record.

fields.name: End_Screen_Display

fields.helpText: This is based on who made the arrest

fields.name: Error_Text_1
fields.fieldText:
There was an error adding information to your case. Please contact your administrator for more information. To continue creating your case, please click here.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
